languages.text: "Рассчитываю, что мои усилия окупятся, или я буду сильно недовол{mf|ен|ьна}. А теперь выкладывай подробности".
"I expect to be well compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."
languages.original_text: "Рассчитываю, что мои усилия окупятся, или я буду сильно недовол{mf|ен|ьна}. А теперь выкладывай подробности".

traits.locale_text: "I expect to be compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."
"I expect to be compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."
"I expect to be compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."
"I expect to be well compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."
"I expect to be well compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."

languages.text: «Espero una buena recompensa por mi esfuerzo o estaré extremadamente decepcionad{mf|o|a}. Cuénteme los detalles».
languages.original_text: "I expect to be well compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."

traits.locale_text: «Espero una buena recompensa por mi esfuerzo o estaré extremadamente decepcionad{mf|o|a}. Cuénteme los detalles».

languages.text: “我希望能得到合适的补偿，否则我恐怕会很不满意。好了，和我说说具体情况吧。”
languages.original_text: "I expect to be well compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."

traits.locale_text: “我希望能得到合适的补偿，否则我恐怕会很不满意。好了，和我说说具体情况吧。”

languages.text: « J'attends une récompense à la hauteur de mes efforts, faute de quoi vous entendrez parler du pays. Mais venons-en plutôt aux détails de l'affaire. »
languages.original_text: "I expect to be well compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."

traits.locale_text: « J'attends une récompense à la hauteur de mes efforts, faute de quoi vous entendrez parler du pays. Mais venons-en plutôt aux détails de l'affaire. »

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}の努力に対して十分な報酬が与えられることを期待する。さもないと、{mf|俺|私}はひどく機嫌が悪くなるだろう。では、{mf|俺|私}に詳細を伝えよ」
languages.original_text: "I expect to be well compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}の努力に対して十分な報酬が与えられることを期待する。さもないと、{mf|俺|私}はひどく機嫌が悪くなるだろう。では、{mf|俺|私}に詳細を伝えよ」

languages.text: "Çabalarımın karşılığını fazlasıyla almayı umuyorum. Aksi durumda epey hoşnutsuz kalırım. Şimdi bana detayları aktar."
languages.original_text: "I expect to be well compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."

traits.locale_text: "Çabalarımın karşılığını fazlasıyla almayı umuyorum. Aksi durumda epey hoşnutsuz kalırım. Şimdi bana detayları aktar."

languages.text: "Ich erwarte eine gute Kompensation für meine Bemühungen, andernfalls wäre ich sehr ungehalten. Und jetzt erzählt mir die Details."
languages.original_text: "I expect to be well compensated for my efforts, or else I shall be severely displeased. Now tell me the particulars."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erwarte eine gute Kompensation für meine Bemühungen, andernfalls wäre ich sehr ungehalten. Und jetzt erzählt mir die Details."
